column2: "With Harriet at their head, the armies of Cuent were besieged by the endless flow of monsters from Es-Ars."
"Morale was high. Over and over, they struggled against the wall of overwhelming strength."
"Defeat would soon be inevitable. The soldiers were growing weary of waiting for the order to retreat."
"However, Harriet did not falter. She held true to her promise with the Guardian, believing they would succeed."
"Lady Harriet, we cannot wait any longer! We must regroup within Cuent's borders!"
"...We cannot. If we pull back now, we will be overcome! Endless reinforcements hounding us at every step!"
"T-Then we will hold them off with our border defenses...!"
"This is it, Varuna. These frontlines here are our final line of defense."
"Should these hordes pass into our borders, it would spell the end for Cuent. Therefore, we must defend it until we have breathed our last."
"Guh, they've advanced this far!"
"...Guardian. I pray you are victorious."
"This is the capital of Es-Ars. Yet we haven't seen a single person. They must have..."
"...The people of the capital have likely been wiped out. The government officials, the citizens who lived here. All of them."
"...All dead from playing with Flo."
"Killing off his countrymen is just a game to him...?"
"No, you have it backwards. They were destroyed because he played with them."
"And now Flo is searching for something new to amuse him."
"He wants to play with Cuent, with Harriet... With you, Guardian."
"You seem awfully calm."
"How do you know that?"
"Because..."
"Welcome back, Clarissa."
"You brought them like I asked. Someone for me to play with."
"Like he asked... Clarissa?! Were you...?"
"...Correct. I have already died."
"The Clarissa you see before you was created by Flo. It moves in accordance with his will."
"Flo desired a friend, and I was to bring him one. Such was my purpose."
"So it was all a trick?"
"Were you lying when you asked us to save him?"
"Well..."
"Heeeey, don't just ignore me! Go away already, Clarissa!"
"Clarissa?! What did you do to her?!"
"Hm? You wanna see Clarissa? I can make as many as you want. Watch."
"See?"
"And not just Clarissa. I've got all kinds of friends!"
"See? Isn't it amazing? I can keep on making friends to play with for forever!"
"Is this replication magic...? Or cloning...? No, it's way beyond that."
"Could he be using the information stored in the Akashic Record to do this?!"
"...'Kay, let's play! Everyone else broke too quickly and it was really boring!"
"So I asked Clarissa to go out and find me a toy that wouldn't!"
"Now I have you... So let's play lots and lots!"
"Come on and play! With both of us! We'll have so much fun together!"
